explanation: formal; to find a way of avoiding a difficulty or a rule
sentence: They found a way of circumventing the law.
sentence_gap: They found a way of _____________ the law.

explanation: to delay something until a later time
sentence: The department deferred the decision for six months.
sentence_gap: The department ________ the decision for six months.

explanation: formal; (especially of an organization) to pay the cost of something
sentence: The company will defray all your expenses, including car rental.
sentence_gap: The company will ______ all your expenses, including car rental.

explanation: solid waste from animals, especially cattle and horses
sentence: The dung produced as a result was more fertile than ordinary types.
sentence_gap: The ____ produced as a result was more fertile than ordinary types.

explanation: a picture of an object that is used to represent a particular person, group, or idea
sentence: A rose is the national emblem of England.
sentence_gap: A rose is the national ______ of England.

explanation: to cut words, pictures, or patterns into the surface of metal, stone, etc.
sentence: The jeweller skilfully engraved the initials on the ring.
sentence_gap: The jeweller skilfully ________ the initials on the ring.

sentence: I shall be back ere nightfall.

explanation: used too often and therefore boring
sentence: The plot of the film is just a hackneyed boy-meets-girl scenario.
sentence_gap: The plot of the film is just a _________ boy-meets-girl scenario.

explanation: formal; connected with human activity at sea
sentence: Amalfi and Venice were important maritime powers.
sentence_gap: Amalfi and Venice were important ________ powers.

explanation: formal; having or seeming to have unlimited knowledge

sentence: Through hard work and perseverance, he worked his way up to the top.
sentence_gap: Through hard work and ____________, he worked his way up to the top.

sentence: The wood normally used for the roof beams is juniper or poplar.
sentence_gap: The wood normally used for the roof beams is juniper or ______.

explanation: literary; a sign or warning of something that is going to happen in the future, especially when it is something unpleasant
sentence: The event proved to be a portent of the disaster that was to come.
sentence_gap: The event proved to be a _______ of the disaster that was to come.

sentence: What level of prowess is meant by the word musicianship?
sentence_gap: What level of _______ is meant by the word musicianship?

sentence: Just a wee drop of milk for me.
sentence_gap: Just a ___ drop of milk for me.
